$ cat topologia1.txt 
#NODE
n1,00:00:00:00:00:01,192.168.0.1,0.0.0.0
n2,00:00:00:00:00:02,192.168.0.2,0.0.0.0
#SWITCH
s1,2
#LINK
n1,0,s1,0
n2,0,s1,1
$ ./simulator topologia1.txt ping n1 n2
00:00:00:00:00:01->FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF|ARP_REQUEST,192.168.0.2?
00:00:00:00:00:02->00:00:00:00:00:01|ARP_REPLY,192.168.0.2=00:00:00:00:00:02
00:00:00:00:00:01->00:00:00:00:00:02|192.168.0.1->192.168.0.2,TTL=8|ICMP_ECHOREQUEST
00:00:00:00:00:02->00:00:00:00:00:01|192.168.0.2->192.168.0.1,TTL=8|ICMP_ECHOREPLY
$ ./simulator topologia1.txt traceroute n1 n2
00:00:00:00:00:01->FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF|ARP_REQUEST,192.168.0.2?
00:00:00:00:00:02->00:00:00:00:00:01|ARP_REPLY,192.168.0.2=00:00:00:00:00:02
00:00:00:00:00:01->00:00:00:00:00:02|192.168.0.1->192.168.0.2,TTL=1|ICMP_ECHOREQUEST
00:00:00:00:00:02->00:00:00:00:00:01|192.168.0.2->192.168.0.1,TTL=8|ICMP_ECHOREPLY
$ cat topologia2.txt 
#NODE
n1,00:00:00:00:00:01,192.168.0.2,192.168.0.1
n2,00:00:00:00:00:02,192.168.1.2,192.168.1.1
#ROUTER
r1,2,00:00:00:00:00:03,192.168.0.1,00:00:00:00:00:04,192.168.1.1
#ROUTERTABLE
r1,192.168.0.0,0.0.0.0,0
r1,192.168.1.0,0.0.0.0,1
#LINK
n1,0,r1,0
n2,0,r1,1
$ ./simulator topologia2.txt ping n1 n2
00:00:00:00:00:01->FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF|ARP_REQUEST,192.168.0.1?
00:00:00:00:00:03->00:00:00:00:00:01|ARP_REPLY,192.168.0.1=00:00:00:00:00:03
00:00:00:00:00:01->00:00:00:00:00:03|192.168.0.2->192.168.1.2,TTL=8|ICMP_ECHOREQUEST
00:00:00:00:00:04->FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF|ARP_REQUEST,192.168.1.2?
00:00:00:00:00:02->00:00:00:00:00:04|ARP_REPLY,192.168.1.2=00:00:00:00:00:02
00:00:00:00:00:04->00:00:00:00:00:02|192.168.0.2->192.168.1.2,TTL=7|ICMP_ECHOREQUEST
00:00:00:00:00:02->00:00:00:00:00:04|192.168.1.2->192.168.0.2,TTL=8|ICMP_ECHOREPLY
00:00:00:00:00:03->00:00:00:00:00:01|192.168.1.2->192.168.0.2,TTL=7|ICMP_ECHOREPLY
$ ./simulator topologia2.txt traceroute n1 n2
00:00:00:00:00:01->FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF|ARP_REQUEST,192.168.0.1?
00:00:00:00:00:03->00:00:00:00:00:01|ARP_REPLY,192.168.0.1=00:00:00:00:00:03
00:00:00:00:00:01->00:00:00:00:00:03|192.168.0.2->192.168.1.2,TTL=1|ICMP_ECHOREQUEST
00:00:00:00:00:03->00:00:00:00:00:01|192.168.0.1->192.168.0.2,TTL=8|ICMP_TIMEEXCEEDED
00:00:00:00:00:01->00:00:00:00:00:03|192.168.0.2->192.168.1.2,TTL=2|ICMP_ECHOREQUEST
00:00:00:00:00:04->FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF|ARP_REQUEST,192.168.1.2?
00:00:00:00:00:02->00:00:00:00:00:04|ARP_REPLY,192.168.1.2=00:00:00:00:00:02
00:00:00:00:00:04->00:00:00:00:00:02|192.168.0.2->192.168.1.2,TTL=1|ICMP_ECHOREQUEST
00:00:00:00:00:02->00:00:00:00:00:04|192.168.1.2->192.168.0.2,TTL=8|ICMP_ECHOREPLY
00:00:00:00:00:03->00:00:00:00:00:01|192.168.1.2->192.168.0.2,TTL=7|ICMP_ECHOREPLY
$ cat topologia3.txt 
#NODE
n1,00:00:00:00:00:01,192.168.0.2,192.168.0.1
n2,00:00:00:00:00:02,192.168.2.2,192.168.2.1
#ROUTER
r1,2,00:00:00:00:00:03,192.168.0.1,00:00:00:00:00:04,192.168.1.1
r2,2,00:00:00:00:00:05,192.168.1.2,00:00:00:00:00:06,192.168.2.1
#ROUTERTABLE
r1,192.168.0.0,0.0.0.0,0
r1,192.168.1.0,0.0.0.0,1
r1,192.168.2.0,192.168.1.2,1
r2,192.168.0.0,192.168.1.1,0
r2,192.168.1.0,0.0.0.0,0
r2,192.168.2.0,0.0.0.0,1
#LINK
n1,0,r1,0
r1,1,r2,0
r2,1,n2,0
$ ./simulator topologia3.txt ping n1 n2
00:00:00:00:00:01->FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF|ARP_REQUEST,192.168.0.1?
00:00:00:00:00:03->00:00:00:00:00:01|ARP_REPLY,192.168.0.1=00:00:00:00:00:03
00:00:00:00:00:01->00:00:00:00:00:03|192.168.0.2->192.168.2.2,TTL=8|ICMP_ECHOREQUEST
00:00:00:00:00:04->FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF|ARP_REQUEST,192.168.1.2?
00:00:00:00:00:05->00:00:00:00:00:04|ARP_REPLY,192.168.1.2=00:00:00:00:00:05
00:00:00:00:00:04->00:00:00:00:00:05|192.168.0.2->192.168.2.2,TTL=7|ICMP_ECHOREQUEST
00:00:00:00:00:06->FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF|ARP_REQUEST,192.168.2.2?
00:00:00:00:00:02->00:00:00:00:00:06|ARP_REPLY,192.168.2.2=00:00:00:00:00:02
00:00:00:00:00:06->00:00:00:00:00:02|192.168.0.2->192.168.2.2,TTL=6|ICMP_ECHOREQUEST
00:00:00:00:00:02->00:00:00:00:00:06|192.168.2.2->192.168.0.2,TTL=8|ICMP_ECHOREPLY
00:00:00:00:00:05->00:00:00:00:00:04|192.168.2.2->192.168.0.2,TTL=7|ICMP_ECHOREPLY
00:00:00:00:00:03->00:00:00:00:00:01|192.168.2.2->192.168.0.2,TTL=6|ICMP_ECHOREPLY
$ ./simulator topologia3.txt traceroute n1 n2
00:00:00:00:00:01->FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF|ARP_REQUEST,192.168.0.1?
00:00:00:00:00:03->00:00:00:00:00:01|ARP_REPLY,192.168.0.1=00:00:00:00:00:03
00:00:00:00:00:01->00:00:00:00:00:03|192.168.0.2->192.168.2.2,TTL=1|ICMP_ECHOREQUEST

00:00:00:00:00:04->FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF|ARP_REQUEST,192.168.1.2?
00:00:00:00:00:05->00:00:00:00:00:04|ARP_REPLY,192.168.1.2=00:00:00:00:00:05
00:00:00:00:00:04->00:00:00:00:00:05|192.168.0.2->192.168.2.2,TTL=1|ICMP_ECHOREQUEST
00:00:00:00:00:05->00:00:00:00:00:04|192.168.1.2->192.168.0.2,TTL=8|ICMP_TIMEEXCEEDED
00:00:00:00:00:03->00:00:00:00:00:01|192.168.1.2->192.168.0.2,TTL=7|ICMP_TIMEEXCEEDED
00:00:00:00:00:01->00:00:00:00:00:03|192.168.0.2->192.168.2.2,TTL=3|ICMP_ECHOREQUEST
00:00:00:00:00:04->00:00:00:00:00:05|192.168.0.2->192.168.2.2,TTL=2|ICMP_ECHOREQUEST
00:00:00:00:00:06->FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF|ARP_REQUEST,192.168.2.2?
00:00:00:00:00:02->00:00:00:00:00:06|ARP_REPLY,192.168.2.2=00:00:00:00:00:02
00:00:00:00:00:06->00:00:00:00:00:02|192.168.0.2->192.168.2.2,TTL=1|ICMP_ECHOREQUEST
00:00:00:00:00:02->00:00:00:00:00:06|192.168.2.2->192.168.0.2,TTL=8|ICMP_ECHOREPLY
00:00:00:00:00:05->00:00:00:00:00:04|192.168.2.2->192.168.0.2,TTL=7|ICMP_ECHOREPLY
00:00:00:00:00:03->00:00:00:00:00:01|192.168.2.2->192.168.0.2,TTL=6|ICMP_ECHOREPLY
